description:
Gothitelle, known as the Astral Body Pokémon, resembles a stylized depiction of a lady wearing gothic lolita style clothing. It can see into the future by observing the stars` placement and movement. One of the things it looks for is the lifespan of Trainers.
IGN described it as "a lady centipede that is wearing an evening gown". Game Informer`s Jeff Marchiafava criticized Gothitelle, stating "this isn`t even a Pokémon, it just looks like an indignant girl in a dress".
name: Gothiruselle
